ua.training

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.training.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains main game loop method and input checker method. Sets range of random number for the game.

    • Method Detail

      • processUser

        public void processUser()
        Main game loop.

      • settingUpLimits

        public void settingUpLimits(java.util.Scanner sc)
        This method setting up limits for the game. User choose if the limits would be defaults (0 and 100) or new. If last one then method also checks if right limit is greater than left limit.
        Parameters:
        sc - input stream.

      • getInputValueWithScanner

        public int getInputValueWithScanner(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Input checker. Ask to input another value while current is not integer or if given number outside of the range (- between left and right limits).
        Parameters:
        sc - input stream
        Returns:
        users input value

      • getIntValueWithScanner

        public int getIntValueWithScanner(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Input checker. Ask to input another value while current is not integer.
        Parameters:
        sc - input stream
        Returns:
        users input value
